title: Food handling
creator_credit: Kathleen O'Brien and New Zealand National Film Unit
brief_description: Contrasts the healthy interior of a clean restaurant with the conditions of a careless eating-house. Shows the use of mechanised handling of food and stainless steel containers for hygiene.
creator_credit_for_label: Kathleen O’Brien and New Zealand National Film Unit
